name: O'Reilly Infrastructure & Ops Conference
content: Build the new stack—and manage legacy. Whether you’re moving to the cloud, containers, or microservices, the transition requires in-depth knowledge of your legacy systems and their capabilities—not to mention a team who are all on the same page—without interrupting your business. Come to the O’Reilly Infrastructure & Ops Conference to discover how to integrate this new method into your technical and business decisions. Harness the power of the cloud, Kubernetes, automation, and more. Modernizing systems is more than new tools, or simply moving technology to a new location. It requires an IT stack of a new generation of technologies: containers, cloud, microservices, AI, automation...the list goes on. Companies need to empower their developers and tech leads to manage existing legacy systems while seamlessly migrating to a more responsive, predictive, scalable, and cost-effective infrastructure. At the O’Reilly Infrastructure & Ops Conference, you’ll find out how other teams have successfully done it—and learn what pitfalls to avoid.
